Finding ourselves awake at an ungodly hour and the weather forecast not too bitchy, Fl0ydt and I made our second trip to Meckenheim to visit the third Advent calender. Caching-wise the trip was somewhat foreshortened by the fact that I thought the reverse WIGs all used the same puzzle. Still, we had lots of fun, zero rain, some very nice views and a trusty new tool (though the makeshift fork raised some eyebrows). A few of the T4.5 required me giving Fl0ydt a leg-up, but all could be logged. The area looked quite small on paper, but at the end of the day even Fl0ydt's legs were a little tired apparently.Amazing to read that people still care for the memory of these two poor souls. - The cache was spotted straightaway.TFTC & greets from "Blade City" Solingen!Cache #6224 (approx.)Found on 13.
